ignore.description: Indicate which rules to ignore completely.

warnings.description: Indicate which rules to include as warnings.

errors.description: Indicate which rules to include as errors.

list-rules.description: Outputs all of the rules available.

format.description: Indicate which format to use for output.

quiet.description: Only output when errors are present.

exclude-list.description: Indicate which files/directories to exclude from being linted.
